DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis phthisis bulbi , painful blindness , intraocular tumor without metastasis severe rupture eyeball Must speak understand Thai language well Must good consciousness Has history prior enucleation evisceration Can follow least one year Has recent eye infection within 6 month
